thread.title: great location
thread.title_full: great location - Review of 1K Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrea B
title: great location
text:
The staff is so nice, the Manager Lamine Mizi is wonderful.
the rooms are super clean, the location is great!
they have free movies and room service, the staff has great recommendations fro restaurants and shopping
I have stayed there 3 times in the last year already.
I plan on staying there in the future as well!
Room Tip: best kept secret in Paris in the Marai See more room tips
